totalCoach.message: Revamped and developed a responsive Athlete client portal application based on their existing product with Next.js 14
Built readable and reusable code with maintenance in mind with TypeScript and React
Maintained their existing website and Athlete client portal using HTML, CSS and JavaScript
Collaborated with back-end developers and UI/UX designers for the revamped client portal using tools like Git/GitHub, Jira and Slack

infosys.message: Collaborated with developers and UX designers in the Convergence squad to merge multiple in-house Spark analytic applications and develop a market share insights app
Improved RESTful API integration for parsing KPI data and Geojson data to reduce maximum loading times from 20 seconds down to 5 seconds for nodes of around 1000
Spear-headed the migration of the repository from JavaScript using my expertise of TypeScript and mentorship to provide robustness and maintain Spark standards in the repo
Innovated working standards and established the data app engineer chapter
